definition: sterile member of a colony of social insects that forages for food and cares for the larvae
details:
noun
- sterile member of a colony of social insects that forages for food and cares for the larvae
- a person who works at a specific occupation
= example: a person who works at a specific occupation
- a person who acts and gets things done
= synonyms: actor, doer
- a member of the working class (not necessarily employed)
= example: a member of the working class (not necessarily employed)
= synonyms: proletarian, prole
